title: 15/20 games of verbal abuse + 4 games of people going afk
body: I think the penalty system needs to grab one of those major updates, the amount of games in my last 20 games of people telling others to 'kill themselves' I think is unacceptable. I feel as thought I have more chance to win the lotto than to get a game lobby that is half enjoyable.  I think the game needs something like the Low Priority system in Dota.
